scope.description: The name of the scope to which the secret will be associated with.

key.description: A unique name to identify the secret.

string_value.description: If specified, note that the value will be stored in UTF-8 (MB4) form.

bytes_value.description: If specified, value will be stored as bytes.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

post.description: Inserts a secret under the provided scope with the given name.  If a secret already exists with the same name, this command overwrites the existing secret's value. The server encrypts the secret using the secret scope's encryption settings before storing it.
